name: Ankha and balls
description:
This game was an experiment to see what I could do with a little idea I had, and see how fast I could get it all done.

It's a very simple game in general, your objective is to catch the wool balls and avoid dying to make the most points, things will come up to slow you down with time.

Sound effects made on Bfxr: bfxr.net/

Original ost from Ankha Zone (8 bit)

Creator channel: Utku Başerdem:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC--cfFOWl4wPdd00Z7lR8tA
